title: Interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream that she is pregnant according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant in a dream can indicate many different meanings and meanings depending on her condition within the dream and its path, and in general the interpretations range between sad and negative and unhappy and positive and happy and cheerful. Interpretation of a single man’s dream that he is pregnant. A virgin’s dream that she is pregnant in a dream is evidence of many gains. Which she will gain in the near future and nutrition with many benefits that will help her enjoy the happy and stable life that she desires. Pregnancy in an unmarried girl’s dream in general is a sign of joy and happiness and getting rid of all the obstacles and problems that stood in her way in the past period and prevented her from continuing to strive and get closer to Its goals. Al-Nabulsi interprets the dream of pregnancy in a dream for an unmarried woman as evidence of long-term sadness and unhappiness and the inability to succeed, advance, and survive for a long time without the presence of honorable people by her side to help and support her. Interpretation of the dream of an unmarried woman being pregnant with Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the pregnancy of an unmarried girl in a dream As evidence that she will hear some good news in the near future and get rid of the negative feelings that affected her in the past and left her in a state of isolation and loneliness. The dream of pregnancy and childbirth in a girl’s dream indicates that she will find a new job that will bring an appropriate financial gain that will help her provide a stable life without problems. And debts form a heavy burden on her heart. The dream of pregnancy in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates marriage in the near future to a man who has good qualities and morals who treats her with affection and tenderness and takes into consideration God Almighty and that their future life will be very happy. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone with a small stomach. Seeing a pregnant girl In a dream, but her belly is small, this indicates the strong personality that distinguishes her in reality. She bears many responsibilities and that she is a good girl who can be relied upon to solve problems and get out of adversity. A dream about pregnancy and a small unmarried woman’s belly in a dream may indicate that a person close to her is involved in a traffic accident and needs a period to recover and be able to live life again, and this is a great sadness in the dreamer’s life. Many scholars interpret an unmarried girl’s dream of being pregnant and her belly is not visible. For the good qualities that distinguish her and her love for everyone and her ability to help solve problems and adversities easily. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone and my stomach was big. The single girl’s pregnancy and her stomach grew noticeably, a sign of the end of the difficult period in which she suffered many problems and difficulties and she is trying to start her life again and work on Achieving goals and reaching a great position. Seeing a girl alone who is pregnant and in the last months before giving birth is evidence of the new job opportunity that has been made available to her, in which she is trying to prove herself so that she can be promoted and reach a large and important position in her professional life. A dream for an unmarried woman with a large belly indicates Continuous effort and working with all her energy and effort so that she can achieve her goals and not give in to obstacles

title: Interpretation of princes in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Many people wonder about the interpretation of the presence of princes in a dream. Therefore, the encyclopedia presents the interpretation of princes in a dream by Fahd Al-Usaimi, because the rank of princes is considered the highest of all due to the advantages and abilities that the king enjoys that no one else enjoys. Seeing princes in a dream is one of the most positive visions for a person. Whenever a person sees princes in a dream, let him herald the tremendous goodness that will follow. Interpretations of seeing a prince in a dream differ according to dream interpretation scholars, depending on the person who sees him. The vision of the king for an unmarried woman is different from the vision of a married woman, different from the vision of a pregnant woman. Therefore, let us learn about the interpretation of seeing princes in a dream.Interpretation of seeing princes in a dream, Fahd Al-OsaimiInterpretation of seeing princes in a dream, according to Fahd Al-Osaimi. Dream interpretation scholars try to explain the vision of princes in a dream, and they said: If a person sees a prince in a dream, this is evidence that God Almighty will give him relief soon. Because this man wanted to get married. May God bless him and grant him peace, even if he does not work. God gave him a prestigious job, and if this man is poor; God has blessed him with a lot of money, and if he sees in a dream that one of the princes was fired, this is evidence that that person will soon lose his job. And if a poor person sees the prince in a dream; This is a sign from God Almighty that his condition will change for the better, and God will give him money. Until he becomes rich, but if anyone sees the prince take the crown off his head. This is evidence of this person’s neglect in his life and his lack of interest in his behavior, people’s impressions of him, his appearance, and his essence, and evidence that this person is unfair to his family. It is of no use to his parents or his wife if he is married, and he must be kept away from them. Because this harms his home and family. Interpretation of seeing princes in a dream when you are single. If an unmarried woman sees a handsome prince in a dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will marry this woman very soon, and this man will be rich, devoted to what God Almighty has commanded him to do, and abstaining from what God has forbidden, and this is evidence that this woman will. Live a life full of happiness and joy. But if the prince gives a gift to an unmarried woman in a dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will ease this girl’s distress and ease her worries that she was suffering from, and if the unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is married to a prince. This is evidence that a man of high status will marry her. Interpretation of seeing princes in a dream for a married womanBut if a married woman sees a prince in a dream. This indicates that she has authority from her husband, that they are infallible, and that the marital life between them will not be separated for any reason. This is evidence that this woman’s son will have a bright future and will surpass all his peers, and also that this woman will have a prominent position among the children in her family and this woman will enjoy a happy life with the children, she and her husband. And if a married woman sees that her daughter is wearing a dress like a princess, and they crown her with a crown; This is evidence that this woman's daughter. She will marry a rich man and live a good life with him

title: Interpretation of bribery in a dream: Seeing bribery in a dream

preview.html: The concept of charity with money for an unmarried and pregnant girl. Seeing a bribe is a sign of forbidden, illegal, and rejected actions. Bribery symbolizes a wandering spirit associated with evil desires and vices. Seeing a bribe indicates bad consequences and an ending on the social or professional level. A bribe or bribe from a person known to the fortuneteller or from an unknown person whom he does not know symbolizes To the existence of common interests between the fortuneteller and this person, but they are satanic and forbidden interests, and this is a vision that symbolizes the corruption of religion, morals, and education. The worst dream is seeing the priest taking a bribe from a woman, because this dream symbolizes the great injustice that will occur as a result of the bribery and the priest does not know it and does not know it, For example. Testimony, falsehood, slander, gossip, and lying. Seeing a bribe to perform a service or obtaining it illegally symbolizes corruption, and seeing receiving bribes from children or the elderly symbolizes forbidden money in which there is no good or blessing. Bribery in a dream symbolizes the consumption of an orphan’s money, and any amount. A forbidden thing that the dreamer receives in reality is reflected in the dream in the form of the gift giver taking a bribe. Repeating the dream of bribery in the dreamer means the occurrence of great corruption, and it is a warning to the dreamer of the need to correct this matter to avoid falling into a big problem that he will not accept at all. Bribery is a symbol of corruption and forbidden money and seeing it in a dream It symbolizes the viewer's dissatisfaction, curse, and contempt for asking for a bribe and obtaining it, receiving it, or giving it to any person for the purpose of achieving a commercial interest or issue. This matter can be good or not. Seeing a bribe in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a reckless person who has no principles or morals. Seeing a bribe in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a reckless person who has no principles or morals. A bribe in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will face major and serious problems and damages as a result of his illegal or immoral actions. In general, the viewer should be more cautious and careful when seeing a bribe in a dream, because it symbolizes heresy, deception, and a bad result, whether in religion, morals, or actions. And behavior. As for seeing a person in a dream as if he refuses to take a bribe from others, this means that this person is working to protect himself from dangers and falling into the well of desires. Seeing an unmarried girl refusing to take a bribe or refusing to pay a bribe symbolizes that this girl knows how to protect herself from All evil or deceit and machinations of others. To dream of a married woman who refuses to take a bribe or refuses to give a bribe means that she is a woman who maintains her honor and dignity, and the same interpretation applies to seeing a man in his dream who refuses to take or give a bribe. , because this symbolizes that she is a woman with morals. In general, seeing one’s distance from bribery, whether giving it or receiving it in a dream, indicates the master of the right method and approach, despite the machinations of his enemies, envious people, and haters. Bribery of Waseem Yusuf - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating oranges in a dream according to commentators

preview.html: Eating an orange in a dream Eating oranges is considered one of the most delicious types of fruits that you can eat, but when all oranges are in a dream, one wants to know the meaning of this dream in detail and what are the most important clues about it. Interpretation of Dreams When a person sees a dream, he wants to know the exact interpretation of that dream, but he must be sure of The dream when he sees a woman is different from when he sees a man, and we find that there are many interpretation scholars. From explaining this matter, through a different website today we will learn about one of the dreams that many people see and want to know its interpretation, which is eating oranges in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating oranges in a dream When a person sees in his dream that he is eating oranges, this is a sign of the good that is coming to him and that he is capable of On the fulfillment of desires and dreams. Dreaming of a person eating oranges in a dream indicates the difficulties he faced at that time and that he overcame them, especially in his work. Dreaming that he is eating oranges is a sign of the relief he feels after the extreme fatigue and exhaustion to which he was exposed in the past period. A person’s dream that he peels an orange and then eats it is evidence that there are hateful people in his life and he will get rid of them soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an orange tree in a dream: Whoever sees an orange tree in a dream means that he will get rid of the problems and worries that he faced in his life in the previous period. The man who sees an orange tree in a dream means that he will get rid of the problems and worries that he faced in his life in the previous period. Seeing an orange in a dream is a sign that he will become rich or a new job will bring him a lot of money. Whoever sees an orange in his dream indicates that he will enjoy good health in the coming days. A person who dreams of orange in a dream is a sign that he will gain security and peace in the coming days. Life in general. Seeing an orange tree in a dream for a married woman is a sign that she will soon become pregnant in the coming days, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about orange peel: Seeing orange peel in a dream indicates the presence of evil people in the dreamer’s life. Seeing yourself peeling oranges in a dream is A sign that there are a lot of clues in real life. Interpretation of a dream about giving oranges in a dream: Seeing oranges in a dream means that the dreamer will reach a very high position in the coming days. A dream about giving and distributing oranges in a dream indicates good news that the dreamer will receive during this period. A person’s dream of giving oranges in a dream is a sign of the foresighted person’s livelihood and a lot of money in the coming days, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of rotten oranges in a dream Seeing rotten oranges in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s departure from God, the Blessed and Most High, and committing many sins and disobedience. Vision Rotten oranges in a dream are a sign of disappointment and serious failure that the dreamer will experience in the coming days. A person who dreams of rotten oranges in a dream is a sign that he will suffer from a serious illness from which he will suffer for a period of time. Whoever sees in his dream that there is a rotten orange, and he eats it, then this A sign of the bad luck he is suffering from, and God is sorry

title: Interpretation of seeing cats and mice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cats and mice in a dream. Cats are pets that we see in our daily lives on an ongoing basis. As for mice, they are annoying creatures that many people do not want, so the interpretation of seeing a dream. Each of these is the desire to know many people because one of the upcoming dreams that Many people wonder about it, and therefore deepening knowledge of the interpretation of many different dreams and visions has become one of the most important things in the public eye for many people, as dreams differ from one person to another, and the nature of the dream varies, and the reason for this is because it consists of a group of fantasies that appear to a person during his sleep, and in Below we learn many different information about the interpretation of seeing cats and mice in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing cats and mice in a dream. Many people want to know the interpretation of seeing a dream about both cats and mice, and this is the reason for their presence in the dream, and therefore we learn about the interpretation of the dream through a group of The following points that we present to you are as follows: Whoever sees a mouse in his dream, this indicates kindness and food, and that the dreamer expects to obtain a lot of money. Whoever observes or sees the presence of a mouse in his dream, this means that the dreamer has a distinctive personality and status, and therefore should To strive to achieve various goals and benefits. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cats in a dream. As for the second case in which you see cats chasing mice in a dream and then defeating and devouring them, this sometimes means that the dreamer has been in a bad psychological state for a long time and still believes that this state will remain in his control, and will not He can escape from it. The dreamer doubts that this bad period that he is going through will end and he is now at a new turn in order to return to practicing his normal life, in addition to that in the event that there are many family problems and disputes, then after that. A person saw this dream in a dream, and this indicates the near end of these various problems, regardless of their number. Interpretation of seeing a cat chasing a mouse in a dream for a single woman. There are many questions about the interpretation of seeing a cat chasing a mouse in a dream for single women, but the interpretation is the same and similar in Different situations, single or married, and from here it follows that the interpretation of the vision lies in the fact that the dreamer was in a bad psychological state for a fundamentally long time, and moreover he believed that this state that he was going through would control him and accompany him for life and that he would not be able To get out of this situation or a situation similar to it, but if he sees a dream, this indicates the end of this situation soon, and that he will return to practicing it, as he lives a very normal life later. Interpretation of a dream about mice for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for a married woman is as follows: Interpretation of a vision A married woman in a dream with mice or seeing a mouse, in addition to specifying the color of the mouse in the dream, this indicates two situations, so that the first case is that the mouse is white running and playing next to the married woman and she was not afraid of it.

title: Interpretation of seeing our Master Moses, peace be upon him, in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing our Master Moses, peace be upon him, in a dream. Seeing the righteous prophets and saints in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that make the dreamer feel the greatness of his status and his closeness to God, or perhaps it indicates that he is going through a beautiful period full of goals that can be achieved in the near future after seeing this dream, in addition to having There are many other interpretations related to this dream that vary depending on the details. Together they will learn the interpretation of seeing our Master Moses, peace be upon him, in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of seeing Moses in a dream When our Master Moses, peace be upon him, sees him in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will get his rights from his mistake and will have influence and power. Whoever dreams of our Master Moses in his dream and was facing war and problems Great, this indicates his victory over these problems, God willing, and God knows best. A dream about our master Moses, peace be upon him, indicates the destruction and death of a tyrannical people like Pharaoh, and victory for the dreamer, and God knows best. And if someone dreams of our master Moses and he was a prisoner, God willing, his distress will be alleviated and he will be released from prison. When the man sees Married Moses in a dream shows understanding, love, and justice between spouses, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing our Master Moses in a dream portends a miscarriage. Dreaming about our Master Moses, peace be upon him, indicates that there will be problems and separation between one of the dreamer’s relatives and the appearance of a trial in his childhood. Interpretation of dreams to see Moses’ penis in a dream from He saw in his dream the stick of our Master Moses, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s power and that he will obtain all his rights and demands. You will defeat your enemy and God will give you a lot of money. If you dreamed that the staff of our Master Moses was broken, this indicates defeat, problems, injustice, and the disappearance of money from you, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams to see The staff of Moses for the married woman. The staff of our Master Moses in a married woman’s dream indicates that her husband is an upright man who fears God in his work and in his home. The staff of our Master Moses is also her firstborn son who stands by his family in all circumstances of life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Moses clinging to a girl. The staff of our Master Moses Peace be upon him, for an unmarried girl, indicates that this girl will marry a strong man who will protect her, defend her, and help her cling to God and strengthen him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name of Moses in a dream. The name of Moses in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s injustice, but God will save him from it, give him money, and compensate him with goodness, God willing. And God knows best. Prophets and companions are very rare people who appear in dreams, and their appearance is one of the greatest dreams that have many interpretations, and these dreams are reflected in reality in a different way from one person to another.

title: Seeing a dead man crying over a dead man

preview.html: Because the interpretation of dreams depends on the place, time, and age of the person who sees them, today, through our translator, we present the interpretation of this dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying over a dead person in a dream for a single girl. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying over a dead person in a dream for an unmarried girl. It portends a change in the state of grief that this girl is experiencing at the present time. Seeing someone I do not know die in a dream while crying means that the girl is being deceived by Before someone close to her. Seeing a dead mother crying in a dream is a sign of relief from distress, getting rid of sadness and anxiety, and good skin for her soon. Also, seeing a dead woman giving me something in one dream is evidence of kindness and a lot of sustenance for her. If a girl sees in a dream If a sick person dies, this indicates the patient’s recovery and long life. See also: Interpretation of a dead person crying in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying over a dead person in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying over a dead person in a married woman’s dream. Evidence of the obstacles and problems that a woman faces in her life. Marriage. Seeing a dead father crying in a dream means a crisis or divorce, and God knows best. Seeing a dead mother alive and crying in a dream is a sign of negligence and not praying for her. Also, seeing a dead person looking at a married woman in a dream, and crying without speaking to her, is a sign of debts and crimes. Financial, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing a dead person crying over a dead person in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a married man sees in a dream a dead friend crying loudly. This indicates the poor condition of the dead person, and God knows best. Seeing a dead father crying and looking at me in a dream means that the dreamer is severing ties. Kinship. Seeing the deceased still alive and crying, this indicates financial problems that this person is going through in the current period. If a married man dreams that his sick wife is dying. This indicates a short recovery and long life for the wife, and God knows best. Seeing a dead friend giving me something is Sad and not crying in a married man’s dream. It indicates the end of the debts and pains of the dreamer’s life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream Sick The meaning of seeing a dead person crying over a dead person in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that a dead person was crying without a sound. This indicates Fear of the due date, but she and the baby will be fine. I saw a dead man in a dream looking at me sadly and then giving me something, and this indicates ease of birth. Seeing a dead mother looking at me without speaking in a dream and offering me food. This indicates kindness and blessings in life. This lady soon. Seeing dead people alive and crying without pain or sound is evidence of an easy birth, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying over a dead person in a dream for young people and its meaning. If a young man sees a dead person crying, this is a sign of repentance for what he did. Seeing a dead friend crying in a dream It is a sign of fatigue and problems in his life. Also, seeing a woman crying loudly in a dream indicates the end of worry and worry in that person’s life. Seeing a dead person offering me money in a dream is evidence of soon marrying a religious girl. If

title: Interpretation of a dream about witnessing a divorced marriage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about witnessing a divorced marriage in a dream In case you are asking what does the interpretation of a dream about divorced marriage in a dream mean, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about witnessing a divorced marriage in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about witnessing a divorced marriage in a dream can be a sign of psychological crises, and God The highest knowledge: If a divorced woman sees the existence of an absolute marriage in a dream, this may indicate loss and loneliness after separation, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees the existence of a marriage with her ex-husband and she is sad in a dream, this may indicate her ex-husband’s injustice towards her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my wife The ex in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my ex-husband in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing the news of the husband’s death could be a sign of committing sins and disobedience, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a divorced woman sees the death of her ex-husband, it may express good changes, and God knows best. Seeing the death My ex-husband and crying over him could lead to her ex-husband’s condition getting worse, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband getting out of prison in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband getting out of prison in a dream. The ex-husband’s getting out of prison and communicating with her could be a sign of her ex-husband’s remorse, and God knows best. The unseen. Where he expresses remorse and tries to correct the injustice, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her receiving her ex-husband when he leaves, she can express his longing, and God knows best. When she sees my ex-husband leaving prison in a dream, this may be a sign that I am thinking of returning, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband. When a divorced woman sees her ex-husband buying a new house in a dream, it can be a sign of happiness and stability, and God knows best. The unseen. If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is buying her a new house, this may be a sign of stability, and God is Most High. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-husband protecting me in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about eggs in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the symbol of eggs in a dream, as eggs are considered one of the most nutritious foods. Sometimes, but likewise, eggs may also not have a good meaning, so in this article, an encyclopedia site is presented for youEggs in a dream for a married womanIn all cases, good and bad.Eggs in a dream for a married womanEggs in a dream in most cases always indicate an abundance of food And the abundance that the dreamer will receive. Therefore, if a married woman sees in a dream that she has a chicken and is laying an egg for it, this means that the dreamer will become pregnant soon. And if she is already pregnant, this is evidence that the child will always remain male. What do eggs symbolize for males, and names for females, As for the married woman, she sees them in her dream. She boiled eggs and ate them while they were boiled, and they had a sweet taste that she remembered when she woke up. This is evidence of good news and good news, and that the dreamer has ample food in this life. And that her next life will be blessed and free of trouble, and she will work to achieve what You want it without having a lot of trouble. As for eating eggs in a married woman’s dream while they are raw, and she eats them while they are sticky without any modification, this is evidence that the dreamer. She and her husband live on bankrupt money and receive their income illegally. Therefore, raw eggs in the dream are considered... Especially in eating it, dreams have very bad connotations in dreams. It can also be evidence that the dreamer will commit adultery, which will cause her problems and perhaps a scandal in front of her family. The sin that she committed and which the Lord of the Worlds warned us about is sufficient for the one who saw her husband in a dream. He has A lot of chickens and they produce a lot of eggs, and those eggs begin to produce chicks. This is a sign that the husband is facing financial hardship or that there are some problems in his life. But they will be solved soon and this dream means the end of needs and relief from distress, God willing. What is the interpretation of a dream about gathering Eggs in a dream for a married woman? Eggs in a dream for a married woman. What is on the land or on the farm and which the married woman collects in the basket? Evidence that this woman is logical and weighs things with her mind and does not use her emotions as an input to judge things. This dream means that she will overcome all the problems that she will face. In her life, she will not find many punishments. During this, she will enjoy a lot of goodness in life, and this goodness can be moral things that she will acquire and realize well. During her journey in this life, and seeing that her husband is the one who collects the eggs and puts them in a basket. This is evidence that The husband will soon correct his situation and will begin to act more wisely and responsibly than before. It could also be evidence that the husband is suffering from many problems that he has begun to solve, and because of them he will begin to solve them. He has improved his affairs in this life, and you see that there are a lot of eggs in the house and no You know where they come from. These eggs break, leaving stains and causing distress. Eggs in a dream for a married woman in this case. It means that there is a person close to her who is conspiring against her because he does not love her and is working to ruin her life. This person appears to her as a lover, because

title: Interpretation of a dream about taking off his clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing naked people in a dream. This vision is one of the visions that many people see in a dream, and it is one of the visions that have different meanings, as there are certain connotations for this vision that indicate committing sins and revolts. Only after consulting a dream interpretation scholar who has legal knowledge, because the interpretation of a dream does not depend only on the vision we saw, but there are many factors that affect the interpretation, which the dream interpreter must be aware of when interpreting. Interpretation of seeing naked people in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The researcher in the field of dream interpretation, Ibn Sirin, says that being naked in a dream or showing part of a private person in a dream indicates a scandal because it indicates the psychological problems that the dreamer suffers from. Ibn Sirin also sees that it opens up in a dream, so this It indicates an imbalance or psychological instability of the fortuneteller at work. As for the person who dreams that he is ashamed in front of people, this means that the dreamer will be exposed to something, and God knows best. Also, the person who dreams of taking off his clothes at the end could be an indication that he does not have the strength to deal with With people. Seeing naked in a dream Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi says: Being naked in a dream is evidence of remorse, and God knows best. Also, the dreamer who sees in a dream that he is taking off his clothes indicates the appearance of enemies to this dreamer. As for the saying that a person sees in a dream as if he is naked, exposing his limbs Without shame, this indicates an excessive opinion about something he does, which leads to a feeling of exhaustion. As for the saying that he looks in the dream and is ashamed of the world and looks for people to cover him, this is one of the indications that this person may lose his money, God forbid, and become poor. Vision. Naked in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl who sees herself naked in a dream, it is possible that she will be a person who will soon marry a righteous person - God willing. Just like a truly sick unmarried girl who sees herself naked in a dream, this may be a harbinger of her recovery from illness, And God knows best. Seeing nudity in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees in a dream that she is naked indicates that she may be exposed to some bad deeds, and God knows best. Just as a married woman sees in a dream that a certain area is stripped of her clothes, this could indicate problems in the marriage that may lead to Divorce, God forbid. Likewise, a married woman who sees herself naked in a dream, and when she has given birth before, this is a warning to her that she will not suffer, God forbid. Seeing a pregnant woman naked in a dream A pregnant woman who dreams that she is naked in a dream means her comfort. This is one of the signs of imminent birth - God willing - and this may also herald the birth of a good child.
